verses.roman:
tomāra deha tumi kara bībhatsa-jñāna
tomāra deha āmāre lāge amṛta-samāna

synonyms: tomāra deha—your body; tumi—you; kara bībhatsa-jñāna—consider horrible; tomāra deha—your body; āmāre—unto Me; lāge—appears; amṛta-samāna—as if made of nectar.
translation: "You consider your body dangerous and awful, but I think that your body is like nectar.
